Package com.platform.user.internal

Interface OrganizationMemberRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<OrganizationMember,UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<OrganizationMember,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<OrganizationMember,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<OrganizationMember,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<OrganizationMember,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<OrganizationMember>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<OrganizationMember,UUID>
@Repository public interface OrganizationMemberRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<OrganizationMember,UUID>
Repository interface for OrganizationMember entity operations.
